participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ethan is determined and ambitious, often striving to prove his worth despite familial challenges. He has a passion for luxury and enjoys the finer things in life, yet remains grounded in his everyday choices.
participant_1.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Lila Bennett
participant_2.personality: Lila is creative and hopeful, with a strong desire to share her music with the world. She is hardworking and resourceful, balancing her passion for music with her day-to-day responsibilities.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.
